channel.title: Maps Problem
channel.description:
hello guys i got a little problem solving this i realy dont know what is wrong , when i go to varrock castle , the whole castle is gone [img]http://gyazo.com/95833d62e8b9519821935369035212bb.png[/img] in my console it says
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 38425 at ObjectDef.forID(ObjectDef.java:21) at ObjectManager.method175(ObjectManager.java:481) at ObjectManager.method190(ObjectManager.java:1323) at client.method22(client.java:578) at client.method54(client.java:4536) at client.loadingStages(client.java:4493) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:5041) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:4054) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:171) at client.run(client.java:7083) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
i am sure 508 maps are 100% , this is something in the codes i think it has something to do with object manager

item.title: Maps Problem
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

The problem is the map contains an object with an ID higher than the amount of objects that can be held in the object cache. In the “forID” method, you can make it return null if the object ID is too high or just increase the object cache size.

Read full topic

item.title: Maps Problem
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

show the array it is referring to.

Read full topic
